title: DPD
subtitle: Express delivery services that exceed customers' wishes, meet society's  needs and are provided by passionate and professional people in the most environmentally sustainable way possible.
offer:
DPD is part of Geopost, one of the world leading parcel delivery
networks operating in more than 50 countries. Our 57,000 delivery
experts deliver more than 8 million parcels worldwide each day through
the brands DPD, Chronopost, SEUR, BRT, Speedy and Jadlog.
